program.common

Class Question

  • java.lang.Object
    • program.common.Question

  • public class Question
extends java.lang.Object
    Question object used as a listener for the question list for both lecturer and student

    1.0
    Version:
    "%I%, %G%"
    Author:
    Anders Hunderi
